text.0: sing forth and laud with sacred song most active pavamana laud.
text.1: indu who sees with thousand eyes.
text.2: thee who hast thousand eyes to see bearer of thousand burthens they.
text.3: have filtered through the fleecy cloth.
text.4: he pavamana hath streamed through the fleece then he runs into the jars.
text.5: finding his way to indras heart.
text.6: that indra may be bounteous flow most active soma for our weal.
